title: Fs mathewson portrait and mathewson white cap--raw
author: forazzurri2axz

posts.post_title: Fs mathewson portrait and mathewson white cap--raw
posts.post_content:
Greetings everyone--as usual, scans available upon request, best to my email    [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url] or 770 873 1181

Mathewson portrait, Piedmont 150--  well it WOULD be a solid psa 4 EXCEPT for a tiny pinhole above his head in the yellow area; (probably a bullethole but very small  that luckily missed Christy by a hair while fighting in WWI;) and also EXCEPT it has a crease on front and small one in lower left corner. Therefore, it's not a PSA 4 but a vg with tiny pinhole!        $315 delivered

Mathewson , white cap.....piedmont 150 Now this could REALLY be a 4 except half the name on the bottom is missing due to miscut.  otherwise really nice card....$ 315.00 deliveredSOLD

MATTY WHITE IS SOLD--DEL HOWARD POLAR BEAR (vg ) IS AVAILABLE , HOWEVER

bill latzko
